name: After... Wasureenu Kizuna
description:
The story in this game consists of two main parts. First part focusing on school days and a group of students who set out on a hiking trip in Japanese Alps. However, the protagonist of the story, Yuuichi Takawashi, dies in an accident during mountain climbing. But because of the reincarnation process of the soul, Yuuichi's memories are played. But in order to playback the memories of the soul, it is necessary to have someone in your heart who you really want to meet. And so the story flashback to the memories of high-school when you were in third year and play until the day of your accident. Second part start with Yuuichi waking up in a hospital. But not is his own body, but rather in that of whomever you made heroine in the first part of the story. Your soul is sort-of possessing that person's body. You want to tell people you know that you are still alive somehow, but because you are not really you, it appears to be rather difficult feat to achieve. But it is a matter of time when the soul decides to merge, and because two souls cannot forever occupy the same body, the one that doesn't merge will disappear, and if Yuuichi's soul merges, he will continue to live on in this body.

This visual novel plays just as typically, you read through the text with static backgrounds and non-animated characters and occasionally make choices that may propel the story toward a certain direction. There are also unlockable CG scenes and background music which can be viewed from gallery.

Dreamcast and PlayStation 2 ports feature some new characters and scenarios which are not present in PC version.

name: Eggconsole Yokai Tantei PC-8801
description:
This is an action game released by Bothtec in 1984. Venture forth with explosive fireballs as your weapon! Join the Yokai detective on a mission to rescue Sayuri, who has been abducted by monsters.

The player controls the monster detective and engage in battles to rescue Sayuri, who has been lured by a group of monsters.

The unique feature of this game is the distinctive attack method. The fireballs can not only be launched but also freely controlled and detonated. However, since the fireballs are linked to the movement of the player's character, it may be challenging until you get used to it.

Being caught in the blast of a fireball will also knock down your character, so understanding the stage layout and enemy placements is crucial. Controlling the fireballs becomes a key strategy.

description: A simulation game by Shouei System for the Sega Dreamcast. It simulates an off-track betting station, allowing users who are connected to the Internet to bet on horse races from home. The service lasted a year and a half — Shouei System went bankrupt and shut the service down on October 1, 2000 at 17:00 (JST). The game may also be a standalone horse racing sim, however this is unconfirmed.

name: D+Vine[Luv]
description: D+Vine[Luv] (pronounced Divine Love) is a typical J-RPG, using a top-down perspective with a slightly isometric representation, which also utilizes visual novel segments for adventure elements. The player takes control of Hyde, an adventurous lad who has a knack for exploring dungeons in search of relics from the old world. One day, he arrives at the town called Arvil where he hears a rumor about a nearby unexplored cave. He heads there determined to find new relics, not minding the fact that noone's been there in ages and the place is probably infested with monsters. To his surprise, he doesn't discover and relic or a treasure, but instead, a mysterious girl named Yura. She has apparently lost her memory and can't remember anything but her name. Unlike the original PC (Windows) version released almost two years earlier, the Dreamcast port does not feature any adult content.

name: D+Vine[Luv]
description:
"Even at the cost of my life—there is someone I want to protect."

It is said that there once existed a civilization on this earth more advanced than the current one. This rich civilization was built using the power of "magic" granted by the spirits. However, this long-lasting civilization rapidly declined after the spirits disappeared and eventually perished.

There were those who were interested in this ancient world. The protagonist, Hyde, travels around the world seeking the legacy of the old world. During his journey, he happens to visit the town of Arville. There, he hears rumors that something resembling ancient ruins has been found in a nearby cave. Hyde heads to the cave and meets a girl who holds the key to the truth.

The game was developed over a period of more than two years. It features a wealth of content, including around 800 types of items and modes where the enemies' strength is doubled or tripled, providing substantial replay value.

Unlike the original PC (Windows) version released almost two years earlier, the Dreamcast port does not feature any adult content. A couple of years later, DVD PG Edition release came out which also includes adult content.

name: O.To.I.Re: Dreamcast Sequencer
description: O.to.i.Re: Dreamcast Sequencer is a Japan-exclusive Sega Dreamcast music creation game by Waka Manufacturing. It was released only in Japan, and allows the player/user to produce his or her own music tracks via the Dreamcast Controller, Dreamcast Microphone, or Dreamcast MIDI Interface Cable. Additionally, this was the only piece of software released in the Dreamcast's lifespan that supported it's MIDI adapter cable.

name: Final Fantasy IV
description:
A port of Final Fantasy IV for WonderSwan Color released only in Japan. It is largely based on the PlayStation port while lacking its FMVs and having a decreased screen resolution, and down-sampled music and sound effects to meet the specifications of the device.

The WonderSwan Color port introduces a number of graphical enhancements to character sprites and backgrounds by providing additional details and color shading. The original character portraits were replaced with new, smaller portraits. Also, certain boss sprites were changed to those featured in the Japanese Easy Type version of the Super Famicom game.

The game features a revamped difficulty different from both the original and the Easy Type versions.

In Volume 1, we are featuring 3 mini-games that receive inspiration from good old retro bishōjo games! A retro-style visual novel where you get to experience a rare date scene that can't be seen in the main game. Take Ame to a nice place and give her the time of her life!

description:

It includes a whole new "EX Dungeon", a redesigned version of the Lunar Ruins with a number of story changes, and new items introduced in Final Fantasy IV: The After Years.

description: In Monster Hide play as the monster and kill all the humans or work as a team to kill the monster, you can also fight with other players in pvp mode or survive waves of zombies, with different game modes and environment the game has elements of strategy, cooperation and survival.

name: All She Wants For Christmas Is You
description: When the clock strikes midnight, the Christmas demon will be at your door. Trapped at home, you must discover what's around you to survive the night and thwart her terror.

name: Atsumare! Guru Guru Onsen BB
description: Atsumare! Guru Guru Onsen BB (あつまれ！ぐるぐる温泉ＢＢ) is a table game for the Sega Dreamcast.

name: Boku to, Bokura no Natsu
description: Boku to Bokura no Natsu is an adventure game, developed and published by Kid, which was released in Japan in 2002.

name: Candy Stripe: Minarai Tenshi
description: Candy Stripe: Minarai Tenshi is an dating sim adventure game for the Sega Dreamcast. The game takes place in the fictional Holy Angels Hospital. The player is a medical intern, and the game's objective is to establish personal relationships with one of three incoming nurses over a one-year period.

name: Card of Destiny: Hikari to Yami no Tougousha
description: Card of Destiny: Hikari to Yami no Tougousha is a Role-Playing game, developed and published by Abel Software, which was released in Japan in 2002.

name: Castle Fantasia: Seima Taisen
description: "Seimadaisen" is a prequel to the first Castle Fantasia. The events of the game takes place 500 years before those of "Castle Fantasia", and tells the story of a two hundred year long religious war between the Inshiera Empire and the Ruushiera Republic. The Empire worships the God of Light and considers the republicans followers of an evil god. The army of the empire has seven holy squads, and you command a knight named Hyuui, the leader of one of them. "Seimadaisen" is a strategy RPG with erotic content. You fight on large battle screens, navigating your party in turn-based mode, attacking when enemies are in range. Enemies drop hearts when defeated, and collecting those hearts can heal you and raise your parameters. Between battles, there are parts in which you'll have conversations with girls and will be able to choose different answers, leading to different endings.

name: Climax Landers: Motte ke! Minige Campaign
description: Retail disc used in a Japan-wide store campaign before Climax Landers/Time Stalkers for Dreamcast was released. It allowed you to download 3 different free Climax Landers related mini games to your VMU, if you brought it to a participating location. Copies of the disc have since been sold online unofficially.

name: CR Hissatsu Shigotonin Pachitte Chonmage @ VPACHI
description: CR Hissatsu Shigotonin Pachitte Chonmage @VPACHI (CR必殺仕事人 パチってちょんまげ@VPACHI) is a pachinko game for the Sega Dreamcast. It is based on the television series Hissatsu Shigotonin.

name: Detective Pomu and the Tatsuki Manor Mystery
description: Join Detective Pomu as she tracks down the elusive Phantom Thief Selen Tatsuki to her Mystery Manor to save the poor missing Mascots. Solve puzzles, collect cute mascots, and most of all have fun with your oshi! Can Detective Pomu unravel the Mystery of Tatsuki Manor and save the Mascots in time?

name: Nightfall Warriors
description:
Nightfall Warriors is a co-op oriented game (but solo mode is also available), where you fight supernatural monsters with your companion.

The uniqueness of it is that you don't need two headsets to play Duo, only one, and a phone/tablet. This can involve your backseat player friends, family, or channel viewers.

You'll have a bunch of weapons, tools and abilities on your journey. Your companion can aid you by exploring the map, getting all the loot, giving you tools and usings their abilities.

Play with your friends or familliy, or anyone in the world to hunt down evil.

name: Cult of the Lamb: Sins of the Flesh
description:
Sins of the Flesh, the next free update for cute cult sim Cult of the Lamb, offers loyal Followers a slew of worldly pleasures...

In its biggest and most wicked content update yet, the Cult’s tendrils extend even further with a blasphemous beneficence of quests, features, improvements and a deliciously evil new resource that rewards those leaders prepared to yield to the Sins of the Flesh.

name: Orius
description:
Orius is the overseas release of Xexex, a 1991 side-scrolling shoot 'em up arcade game by Konami. It was renamed Orius in North America but kept its original title in other regions.

The overseas versions introduce a variety of changes, with the most notable being the removal of all but one upgradable weapon, as well as the removal of a lives system, which is replaced with an energy bar. The enemy patterns are also changed slightly and the bosses have more health. Upon dying, the player starts where they died instead of going back to a checkpoint.

The overseas versions also features two-player simultaneous co-operative play.

name: Shimizu Ritual
description: Ayaka Nakamura, a respected student at school, harbors a dark secret as she secretly bullies Emi Shimizu, a girl who is interested in the Occult. One day, in what seemed like a normal day for Emi, she summons a devil that can grant her any wish. What will she wish for? Will it be revenge, or something else?

name: Origens: Story Mode
description: 3D story game

name: Adieu Those In Love
description: It's the 2000s, and in a certain village, a delinquent has just returned to her new normal life from the detention center for a crime she didn't commit. Little does she know what awaits her...

name: The Tender Cut
description: The Tender Cut is a first person interactive installation/exploration game inspired by the "Il etait une fois" scene from Luis Bunuel's movie "Un Chien Andalou". It invites the viewer/player to dive into a surreal atmosphere, sharing the character's experience.

name: Halo Infinite: CU29
description:
Content Update 29 (“CU29”) brings a new Arena map, a Covenant object palette and new Forge features, a new armor core and customization rewards, and the first of three free Operations—starting with the Halo Wars-themed “Spirit of Fire.” This operation will be followed up by "Cyber Showdown III" and "The Yappening II" operations. Playlist refreshes will also launch during CU29, including new map additions to the Big Team Battle, Firefight King of the Hill, and Squad Battle playlists.

CU29 will be the first of many future planned updates that will replace the current "season" model, electing instead to provide smaller content drops but at more frequent intervals.

name: School Curse3
description: The third curse...

name: I Am Reiko
description: Step into a post-apocalyptic Japan in I Am Reiko, a unique 2D Rogue-Lite adventure. As the world crumbles around her, Reiko not only battles against hostile forces but faces the haunting shadows of personal loss. Every run is a unique experience, filled with a diverse array of weapons and upgrades.

name: Ripple and Frawg: The Seasonal Song
description: Play as Ripple and Frawg, who use the power of their magical instruments to puzzle through different environments, journey through different seasons, and travel upriver to return home.

name: Save Elizy
description: Save Elizy - is a cooperative survival horror game for 1-4 players. Your path is blocked by demons who will leave you without limbs. Run and hide, save Eliza, but remember - don't let yourself be taken to Hell.

name: The Red Room
description: Discover the secret intimacy of a couple in the infamous Red Room. Enjoy this jigsaw puzzle game with awesome HD renders!

name: Accidental Alchemist
description: Welcome to Accidental Alchemist! Pick up the title Alchemist & unleash chaos in your potion shop, where every mishap creates magical masterpieces. Upgrade, discover secrets, and become the ultimate alchemist!

name: Sex Euphoria
description: Welcome to the captivating world of emotions and discoveries - the game Sex Euphoria ! Immerse yourself in a thrilling visual novel where each photograph is a step towards the pinnacle of success and ecstasy.

name: Seven Second Summer Camp
description: It's time for a meditation game that’s actually fun. After years of meditation practice, and years of gaming practice, GoldVision has combined the two into a meaningful and powerful experience that cares for every frame of the players time.

name: Joy Land
description: Lewis, an intelligent detective, finds himself on a mission to uncover the truth behind the many disappearances including his sister's. With the help of Joy, Lewis is going to explore what lies behind these walls. only to realize that there's much more to discover than he initially thought.

name: The First Mine
description: Welcome to the Wild West. The First Mine is a turn based building and puzzle game. You need to run a productive gold mine by placing and upgrading various resource tiles.

name: Escape from Calypso
description: Immerse yourself in a dark, scary and exciting adventure of exploring an abandoned spaceship. Solve puzzles, look for keys, hide, don't get caught by the strange creatures that roam here. Escape from this ship before it's too late. - Sci-fi - Survival Horror - Metroidvania

name: EngineFall
description:
Start your revolution in a multiplayer social sandbox set aboard colossal trains circling a post-apocalyptic world. Craft, fight, and scheme your way through the classes, take control of the engine, and build your own future.

Enginefall is a multiplayer sandbox combining high-stakes combat, survival crafting, and long-term progression. Start as a “tailie,” trapped in eternal servitude aboard a massive mega-train, and fight to rise through the classes, take the engine, and become the conductor. Whether you focus on shooting and raiding, make friends and build alliances, or craft the ultimate base and gear, every new train is a chance to carve your own path to freedom.

name: Stickin' the Landing
description: Stickin’ the Landing is a relaxing puzzle game where you pilot a spaceship around outlandish galaxies, using stickers and their gravitational properties to reach your destination. Embark on an odyssey through the home’s nooks and crannies, and discover everything this marvelous world has to offer!

name: Detective Bass 2: The Case of the Stolen Pearls
description: Crime never rests... but thankfully, neither does Detective Bass! Put on your detective hat and help Detective Bass get to the bottom of a robbery, in this witty, narrative-driven detective game!

name: Golden Sun 64
description: Golden Sun 64 is a short ROM hack which takes RPG mechanics into Super Mario 64.

name: Cardio Quest
description: Cardio Quest is a fantasy role-playing video game that challenges players to get active and improve their health. By tracking heart rate during exercise, players do battle while they work out in real life.

name: Creature Creator
description: Create your own creatures to explore online worlds with friends and collect new parts to upgrade your stats and abilities! Complete quests, battle enemies, challenge friends to minigames, or just have fun roleplaying — the possibilities are endless when your imagination is the limit!

name: Curse of Babylon
description:
The country of Babylon was once a thriving community, enjoying peace and prosperity. However, all that changed when monsters invaded the land. Eventually, the entire population was wiped out and Babylon became an enclosed area no one dared to enter. Only one brave adventurer traveled to Babylon in an attempt to destroy the evil that dominated it.

Babylon is a side-view action game with light platforming and role-playing elements. The game takes place across interconnected screens, often arranged in maze-like patterns, with vertical shafts that required climbing, dropping down, or jumping over chasms. The jump key is also used for attacking, which requires gaining momentum and repeatedly "bumping" into the enemy. There are no experience points or any type of currency, but defeating enemies may yield healing potions or better weapons and armor. These items can also be found in the numerous treasure rooms found in the game. The player is given considerable freedom as to which area to explore first, but many areas are initially blocked, requiring the player to procure a key or return with better equipment in order to defeat a stronger enemy guarding the location. [MobyGames description]

name: Tetris
description: A version of Tetris developed for Java mobile devices.

name: Shenanigans
description:
The Evil Dr. Wector has taken the Great Sunflower’s Sun Energy for his evil plan and now it is up to you to get it all back! Join the four hooligans, Simon, Sebrina, Rae, and Beast, in a wacky and goofy 2D adventure!

From the mind of The Escaped Mental Patient, John Coday, explore a world of goofy characters and zany places created by Mythos Makers and Co. Run, Jump, Wall Run, and Swing Your Hammer as you go through beautiful levels and take down enemies along the way. You can run through all the levels or take your time. Take advantage of the smooth and fast paced 2D platforming giving you ultimate control of the adventure! Explore the world or speed through to save it! The choice is yours!

Play as one of four nut cases. The bat wielding madman, Simon. His violent hamer swinging sister, Sebrina. A kind witch named Rae, and her empty headed magical creature, Beast.

name: Sekiro: Resurrection
description:
Sekiro: Resurrection is a complete overhaul of the base game.
This mod was made for players, even veterans who wish for more content after beating the game.

name: Bells 'n' Whistles
description: Bells 'n' Whistles is a difficult point-and-click game that tests your ability to multitask. You must deal with the multiple systems on a machine in order to prevent it from breaking down. Are you up to the task?

name: Great Party Games
description: Have fun with the family with this great compilation of 20 classic games like Foosball, Bowling, Air Hockey, Table Tennis and more. With something for everyone Great Party Games will give you and your family hours of fun, either playing on your own against the computer or playing multiplayer against each other

name: Kanau
description:
Prequel to "Karamu".

On the eve of his tenth birthday, Rakuo Kumode undergoes his family’s “initiation rite.” When he bucks against his family traditions, he has an encounter that will change the course of his life forever.

name: Banana Mountain
description: Banana Mountain is a "beginner" Celeste campaign consisting of three chapters of increasing challenges.

name: Derby Tsuku 2
description: Derby Tsuku 2 (ダビつく2) is a Sega Dreamcast horse racing training simulation released exclusively in Japan.

name: Derby Tsuku: Derby Uma o Tsukurou!
description: Derby Tsuku: Derby Ba wo Tsukurou! (ダビつく ダービー馬をつくろう!) is an entry in Sega's Let's Make series for the Sega Dreamcast. It's a horse racing simulation game.

name: Felix the Cat: Classic Edition
description:
A special edition of the Felix the Cat bundle. It includes:
- Physical Copy of Felix the Cat with Reversible Cover
- Felix the Cat Classic Box
- Felix the Cat Original Game Soundtrack (Single Disc)
- 12" x 16" Poster

name: Memories of Mana
description: Memories Of Mana is a fangame created using RPG Maker XP by Moghunter. The game features graphics from Square Enix's Seiken Densetsu 3 series. This was not only Moghunter's first but perhaps also his only completed game. After finishing Memories Of Mana, he bid farewell to the maker community, choosing to dedicate himself to other programming endeavors.

name: Skate
description:
A mobile port of Skate that captures the essence and authenticity of the console title, it features professional skaters such as Danny Way, Chris Cole, Mike Carroll and Rob Dyrdek for players to interact with.

Players must skate their way through the fictional city of San Vanelona on a mission to become a skateboarding superstar by pulling off enough slick moves to capture the cameras and land on the cover of Thrasher magazine. There are twelve missions divided in four goals each.

There is also a freestyle mode with three explorable areas: Plaza, Halfpipe and Downtown.

name: Tao Yuan Shen Chu You Ren Jia
description: This game is a leisurely and soothing Chinese-style pastoral landscape management mobile game. The game is based on traditional culture, with a warm and healing theme, enriching the simple and unpretentious rural life with the aesthetics of lush green landscapes in the style of Chinese classical art, creating a simple and peaceful utopia.

name: Changeable Guardian Estique
description:
An original side-scrolling shoot 'em up game for Nintendo Entertainment System being developed by Cat Hoi Trading LLC set to release in the Summer of 2024.

The game is set in 5 world cities and space, for a total of 6 stages. The moderate difficulty and play time, as well as a large number of visuals, will delight the eyes and minds of the player.

A demo was sold at the Digigame Expo 2023.

name: Spot The Object
description: Embark on an immersive hidden object quest! Explore stunning landscapes, enjoy relaxing gameplay, and unravel challenging puzzles. Discover the joy of Spot the Object today!

name: Links Puzzle
description: The goal is to move every tile (whose moves are determined by its links with another tiles) until create the pattern suggested.

name: Goat's Tale Adventure
description: Step into the shoes of the new heroine and pursue the treasures in this exceptionally demanding adventure. Explore lands where only the most resilient players will reach the summit.

name: Puzzlink
description: Sin descripción

name: Fill Multicolor
description: You are presented with a grid of dots and you must connect all the dots, but there are two-color dots that require certain rules in order to be connected. Dots cannot be connected twice. You must connect all the dots.

name: Nick Wacky Racers 3D
description: Sin descripción

name: Metroid: Juicy Mission
description: Sin descripción

name: DC: Dark Legion
description: DC: Dark Legion is an official authorized DC role-playing strategy game, let us team up with DC superheroes, build the shelter and explore the DC universe.

name: Shape Defenders
description: Why are shapes attacking? Why do you need to deploy traps and shapes of your own to take them out? Who knows, we do know its good, simple old fashioned TD fun.

name: Guardian Frame: Debrief!
description: Guardian Frame: Debrief! is a lighthearted, low-intensity dress-up game about two girls in love: a giant robot, and the engineer that pilots and maintains her.

name: Block Shop
description: Block shop is an automation puzzle game in which basic blocks are transformed and combined to create increasingly complex blocks.

name: Block Hopper
description:
Block Hopper is a 2D platforming game made with low poly 3D assets. The game comes with Four game modes and more bonus levels and content to come in the future and each differs in small ways and large ways.
Block Hopper is a game you can enjoy at your own pace or if you want a bit of a challenge you can play Hardcore Mode which restarts you if you aren't fast enough.

name: Let's Attack Crazy Cross
description: Let's Attack Crazy Cross is a puzzle video game which was developed and published by Konami. It was released for Arcade and PlayStation on March 1996 and it is part of the Taisen Puzzle-Dama series.

name: Captain Laserhawk: The G.A.M.E.
description: Captain Laserhawk is a frenetic arcade Multiplayer Arena Shooter. Dominate in fast-paced, 8-player epic battles and unlock hundreds of unique cosmetics to stand out as you become the ultimate Niji Warrior!

name: Sword of Justice
description: Sword of Justice is an Open world game, famous for its exquisite and delicate picture quality, real and vivid Jianghu atmosphere, subversion of traditional MMO techniques, and intelligent Al's profound impact on the game world. It is known as the "breathing Jianghu".

name: San Diego Zoo Presents: The Animals!
description: The game is divided into 5 different sections focusing on baby animals, animal facts, animal habitats, information on the San Diego Zoo itself and all about saving endangered animals from extinction. The content consists of several video clips, audio, photos and articles.

name: Taisen Tokkae Dama
description: Taisen Tokkae Dama is a puzzle game developed and published by Konami and released for Arcade in 1996 only in Japan. It is part of the Taisen Puzzle-Dama series while adding some new gameplay mechanics.

name: Matadouro: Grindhouse
description: A rogue detective infiltrates a cult compound to save a kidnapped woman and discovers a dark labyrinth of inhumane experiments and manmade flesh monsters. A tense and unnerving first-person survival horror game, with limited resources, exploration, and puzzle-solving.

name: Dark Space
description: this small game was made from the idea of 3 friends for a school project, the game is a boss battle that starts when you reach 100 points, in it you are the last hope of protecting the planet from an alien invasion, so be careful !

name: Wagamama Fairy: Mirumo de Pon! Taisen Mahoudama
description: Wagamama Fairy: Mirumo de Pon! Taisen Mahoudama is a Taisen Puzzle-Dama game featuring characters from the slice of life manga and anime series Wagamama Fairy: Mirumo de Pon!

name: Etrian Odyssey Heardle
description:
A clone of Heardle, and K-Pop Heardle but for Etrian Odyssey musics. Based on Joywave Heardle.

Each Etrian Odyssey Heardle is randomly chosen from Etrian Odyssey's soundtrack.

name: Pokémon Infinite Heardle
description:
A clone of Heardle, and K-Pop Heardle which can be played infinitely and with Pokémon's musics. Based on Joywave Heardle code and Pokémon Heardle musics.

Each music is randomly chosen from mainline Pokémon's game soundtrack.

name: Agent
description: Take the role of a disgruntled volunteer in an out of control version of the 1980s, investigating violent occurrences playing into the hand of a cult.

name: Always Surrender
description: Always Surrender is a vertically scrolling shoot 'em up score attack, with an emphasis on pushing your luck as far as you can. Last as long as possible against an endless horde of enemies and then surrender in order to bank the bonus.

name: Mission Craft
description: An arcade shoot-em-up that repurposes assets from StarCraft and Warcraft II, Mission Craft has players choose between terran, protoss, and zerg ships to blast their way through enemy bases.

name: Monster Bargain
description: Created for the GMTK 2023 Game Jam, "Roles Reversed". Assume the role of a monster in a JRPG and use the battle menu to swindle the hero for everything they've got!

name: Quick Quest
description:
Explore a pixelated world steeped in nostalgia with our retro roguelite game. Conquer procedurally generated levels and survive with just one life in this thrilling challenge. Master the jump, attack, and charged attack in a classic platforming view.

What sets our game apart is the epic boss battles. Dive into strategic showdowns, blending the essence of Zelda 2 and Megaman, with the addition of a tactical wall jump for intense boss fights. there are approximately 10 bosses along the run.

As you traverse the procedurally generated levels, you'll regularly discover a variety of equipment in special rooms throughout your run. Equipment come in various types, including swords and helmets, each enhancing or modifying your attack and potentially adding special moves. Be cautious, though, as these can be lost during the run, and the compatibility of certain helmets with specific swords adds an extra layer of strategy.

In addition to traditional weapons, there are throwable items and consumables to aid you in your journey. Use these strategically to gain the upper hand in challenging situations.

Try also more roguie patches that, unlike other equipment, cannot be lost during the run. introducing distinctive functionalities.

Every death means losing your hard-earned equipment, but persevere to unlock permanent feats and new game modes. Get ready to face the challenge and beat your best progress in this nostalgic retro world. Will you manage to complete the run?

name: Fortune Street 2: Rolling Again
description: Fortune Street 2: Rolling Again is a fan made, non official project that provides a new wave of customly created content for western fans of the Wii release who dream for a successor. This version of Fortune Street also contains a rule pack designed to rebalance certain aspects of the game and add quality of life enhancements that the stages are specifically built around. Altered text files, swapped backgrounds, and music files will all be included in the files you need to replace to play the game.

name: Rong Yu Zhi Hui Guan
description: Sin descripción

name: Soul of Sovereignty: Prelude
description:
Soul of Sovereignty is a visual novel of deadly kindness and selfish virtue in a world of magic and ruin.

Story and music by ggdg (Cucumber Quest), featuring tracks by Toby Fox (Undertale, Deltarune).

name: McWorld
description: McWorld was a flash-based virtual-world MMO created by McDonalds in 2008. The in-game world was divided into a variety of themed areas with their own unique minigames, shops, and media tie-ins. Players could customize their avatar and treehouse with various items and accessories, some of which were based on McDonalds products.

name: Foothold VR
description: Defend your settlement against the corrupting forces of Malice by gathering materials and constructing defenses. In this post apocalyptic VR tower defense game, learn to wield your gravity glove to collect scrap metal, build turrets, and repel enemies.

name: JongRo 3_Street
description: "In the year 2024, South Korea has become a wasteland due to the Epsilon virus. South Korea is full of infected people. In this desolate landscape, a man hears a rumor about a path to salvation at Jongno 3-ga Station and decides to head there."

description: Sin descripción

name: Fractal Space HD
description:
HD Edition: 5 Exclusive Legendary Taser Colors, 4K Resolution, HD textures and dynamic lighting! If signed in to Google Play Games, automatic cross-save to keep your progress from the FREE version!

Live the memorable adventure of Fractal Space, an immersive 3D first person adventure and puzzle game in a beautiful science-fiction universe! Will you solve the mysteries of this space station and get out alive? This, my friend, is up to you...

name: Rayman
description: A Sega 32x version of the very first Rayman game which never came to be.

name: Memory Link
description: A heartwarming story of a boy chasing memories of a dreamy girl. Explore a mysterious world in this stylish platformer game.

name: Taurian Defense
description:
Inspired by 1980s top-down arcade-style shooters, in this game you must defend your bases from an enemy invasion. The future of colonization depends on you!

Pilot the most advanced Taurian defense ships, each with their own special capabilities to help drive back the invading forces.

name: Slendytubbies 2D
description: Slendytubbies 2D is a two-dimensional pixelated remake of the Slendytubbies series.

name: Battle Typer
description: Welcome to Battle Typer, the ultimate destination for typing enthusiasts and beginners alike! If you're on the hunt for thrilling typing games that you can enjoy directly in your browser, you've come to the right place. Battle Typer offers an immersive and engaging experience for players of all skill levels, from beginners looking to improve their words per minute to seasoned typists seeking a new challenge.

name: Bendy Royale
description: Bendy Royale is a fan-made playable version of the April fools troll game trailer with the same title.

name: Die Drei ??? und der Riesenkrake
description: Sin descripción

name: Alpine Ascent
description:
Alpine Ascent is a little chill climbing platformer made for PICO-8.

The green bar represents your stamina. When it reaches zero, you cannot climb or jump. You can replenish stamina by landing, or using a green stamina coin. Collecting gold coins will increase your maximum stamina.

You will slip down when climbing on ice blocks. You cannot climb on obsidian blocks, and magma blocks will quickly drain your stamina while you climb them.

For an extra challenge, try to get to the top of the mountain without letting your stamina reach zero, or collect all the coins!

name: One Night
description: Escape from the anime girls.

name: Inscryption Pico-8
description: A demake of Inscryption for PICO-8. Your goal is to defeat Leshy.

name: Picolumia
description: A demake of Mixolumia for the PICO-8. The goal is to reach level 15 by clearing 450 blocks. If the board fills up you lose.

name: Denpa Shonen-teki Kenshoseikatsu Soft Nasubi no Heya
description: Denpa Shonenteki Kenshoseikatsu Soft Nasubi no Heya (電波少年的懸賞生活ソフト なすびの部屋) is a 1999 game by Hudson for the Sega Dreamcast. It ties into a Japanese reality show where a comedian willingly locked himself in a small apartment living off sweepstakes winnings until he won ¥1,000,000 worth of goods.

description: Guru Guru Onsen 2 (ぐるぐる温泉２) is a table game for the Sega Dreamcast and Windows PCs, the Windows version appropriately being titled Guru Guru Onsen 2 for Windows (ぐるぐる温泉２ for Windows).

name: Guru Guru Onsen 3
description: Guru Guru Onsen 3 (ぐるぐる温泉３) is a table game for the Sega Dreamcast.

name: Iris
description: Iris is one of Kid's romantic visual novels with a school setting. This story centers around junior high-school students in their final year and takes place in a town called Hisame-cho during winter time. This visual novel focuses on the story of one's first love. You are Haruki Setohara, a third year junior high-school student, and by selecting different choices in the story, you focus your affections toward the girl of your choice. Leading female characters you get in contact with are Sakura, your classmate, Shinonome, Sakura's close friend, Yui, a junior high school graduate who lives next door, Miu, a first year junior high-school student, Manami, your class president, and Natsumi, your cousin and also your classroom teacher. The story branches based on player's choices which are presented at key points in the story. It features many options regarding the style menu for visual design, and sound menu where you can setup the music and even turn on/off voice-acting for an individual female characters. As you play the game, many extras are unlocked which can be accessed from the main menu. Extras include CG artwork, background music, opening cinematic, and a list of the cleared chapters.

name: Tsukiweb
description: An unofficial web-based, open-source reimplementation of the 2000 visual novel Tsukihime.

name: Alchemist Quest
description:
Each of the main quests issued by the Alchemists' Fellowship involves different methods of playing the game. Will you brave the dungeon area and all of its turn-based RPG action to bring the fellowship proof of your prowess? Will you elect to go the farming route and grow mythical crops in your garden? Will you gather the resources you need to expand your home beyond what contemporary craftsmanship allows? Or will you spend your time fishing for a legendary lunker?

No two routes play exactly the same, and you can take on whichever you want—or even all of them at once—while also completing optional quests for a variety of townsfolk.

name: Anji: Implication
description:
Anji: Implication is a horror walking simulator where you just go down the stairs.
The in-game screen has a 16:18 layout, and when you play on the 16:9 screen, a black belt appears on the side, and the game is played in a layout similar to a smartphone.

name: Atlyss
description: Enter the world of ATLYSS, a single-player/online RPG where you can fight with or against friends in a surreal world filled with creatures beyond comprehension. Customize and progress your character(s), complete quests, and discover strange locations.

name: Banana Fighting
description: The banana warriors defeated the invaders, and are living a peaceful life. At the time the banana king is getting old, the village is ready to hold a trump card banana contest, the winner will succeed as the new king, get ready banana warriors, a game of wits is about to begin.

name: Sleep When I'm Dead: Chapter 0
description: On October 31st, Sophie ascends through the chambers of Regis Academy to find Suzy and give her a treat, fighting hordes of monsters along the way.

name: Fear For Sale: The Curse of Whitefall Collector's Edition
description: Paranormal occurrences are spooking the workers and halting construction at a hotel site in Alaska, so you’re sent to investigate. Things quickly turn dark as apparitions try to keep you away and you’re transported into the past! Nothing is as it seems in this old mining town. Can you keep history from repeating itself and save yourself in time? Find out in this haunting hidden-object puzzle adventure!

name: Solbrain: Knight of Darkness
description:
The old gods have forgotten this land (Cannae). No one could save our people when darkness began to spread and collect the souls of men for his army.
Solbrain - Knight of Darkness is a 3D exploration game.

name: FPS Russia: The Game
description: FPS Russia: The Game is a shooter and endless runner game that is based on the YouTube channel FPSRussia.

name: Slendytubbies: Dipsy's Workshop
description:
Welcome to Dipsy's Workshop!
This is an official Slendytubbies game, play as Dipsy and slash and dash your way through hordes of innocent tubbies to get high scores! How high can you get?. Have fun! :)

name: Hexed
description: Can you build and fight through endless levels to bring life and color to your world? Customize towers and troops to ward off enemies in this fast-paced and colorful tower defense.

name: Slendytubbies: Anniversary Edition
description: Slendytubbies: Anniversary Edition (known simply as Slendytubbies and among mobile android users as Slendytubbies: Android Edition) is a remake of Slendytubbies — it was made to celebrate the third anniversary of the first game.

name: Heroes of Eternal Quest
description: Welcome to a never-ending adventure full of challenges. Gather resources, build all sorts of buildings, unlock mysterious cards, and lead a group of heroes destined for greatness. Explore the unknown, climb the Tower of Shards, and break free from a destiny we never chose.

name: Sweet Flowers and Salt
description:
Accompany the hardworking Salt as she looks after a beautiful garden. A cute healing type of game that's as sweet as Salt herself.

Grow flowers with Salt, harvest and collect in your collection box to level up, and reach the 99th level for your wish for happiness to be granted.

name: A Long Goodbye
description: A Long Goodbye is a short narrative game centered around two old friends who have to say their final goodbye over a phone conversation. The game focuses on using a realistic conversation structure, with each reply moving the conversation down a new winding path. Play through multiple times to explore new topics and learn more about the characters, their shared history, estrangement, and the things left unsaid.

name: Kokusai Shitei Kaii 123-gou Haison
description: Sin descripción

name: It Paints Me
description: It Paints Me is a short Gothic horror visual novel about art, pain, and love.

name: The Last Winter Knight
description: Haunt a suit of armour. Explore an abandoned castle. Remember your past–and bring an end to the tragedy you uncover in this melancholy yet hopeful visual novel.

name: Shmoup
description: Sin descripción

name: Konjiki no Gash Bell!!: Friends of Eternal Bonds
description: A gacha RPG mobile game based around the Konjiki No Gash Bell/Zatch Bell anime.

name: xNetHack
description:
xNetHack is a fork of the dungeon exploration game NetHack. It is a distant descendent of Rogue and Hack, and a direct descendant of the development version of NetHack 3.7.

The main goals of xNetHack are to take vanilla NetHack and:

1. Fix gameplay balance issues.
2. Remove tedious and frustrating parts of the game.
3. Make uninteresting parts of the game more interesting.
4. Experiment with new ideas from the community.

name: Honkai: Star Rail - If One Dreams At Midnight
description:
Version 2.0 of Honkai: Star Rail, which includes:
• New characters: Black Swan, Sparkle and Misha
• New Trailblaze Mission: Long Day's Journey Into Night
• New planet: Penacony, the Planet of Festivities
• New enemies: Dreamjolt Troupe, Memory Zone Memes and more
• New quality of life updates
• …and more!

name: Sei-Romance Gakuen: Koi no Toki-meki Daisakusen
description: In the Romance Academy, the girls have all it takes to seduce the boys, notably a laser beam that keeps them at their beck and call! Once you meet a boy, click on his head to start seducing him, but watch out for the other girls, who will try and steal your conquests. Don’t let that happen! If you see another girl trying to chat up the same guy as you, click your mouse repeatedly to get the upper hand. Fill up all the hearts to become the best seducer in school!

name: Nibansen
description: If something unusual happens, return to the opposite passage! A mysterious respect-based escape game from the subway station to the exit "Line 2 | Nibansen"

name: Hero of Minotaurs
description: Hero of Minotaurs is a story of how one injured hero accidentally encounters many friendly minotaur...

name: D.C.5: Da Capo 5 Future Link
description: Sin descripción

name: Dungeons and Dungeons
description: Sadie and Max through a treacherous maze of levels (6 in all), fending off attacks from wandering dungeon-dwellers and mechanical pleasure-bots.

name: Sus Hat
description: A game with mostly linearly gameplay and turn-based battles about looking for secrets and colecting items, outfits and equipment.

name: Knights of Fresco
description: Raise your own band of Knights and fight beasts from medieval paintings. Knights of Fresco is an open world party building RPG with auto-battling combat that tries to emulate medieval depictions of battles and wars.

name: Magic Planet Snack
description: Sin descripción

name: Slendytubbies: Worlds
description: Slendytubbies: Worlds is the sixth and last game of the Slendytubbies series developed by ZeoWorks.

name: Pokémon Modern Emerald
description: A ROM hack of Pokémon Emerald with enhancements which modernize the game but also make it stay true to the vanilla experience. Optional features include: physical and special move split, reuseable TM's, a built-in Nuzlocke mode, and more. Made by resetes12.

name: Nowhere
description:
Nowhere is a Nordic inspired narrative mystery/horror game, revolving around Nordic mythology and what happened to these Gods after Ragnarök and how the rise of Christianity impacted them and their worship.

Featuring the mixing styles of detective gameplay and survival horror, It's going to appeal to people who love a good mystery and also love to be scared, wandering through these haunting atmospheres, feeling something watching them at every turn while the tension builds and builds until the world turns into a nightmare and its fight or flight.

name: Fertilizer
description: Alaska, a girl who loves to take care of plants, draw and hang out with her best friend. This time she will need your help to fertilize the new plants which she bought, and I'm sure you will work well together. I think you'll even learn a few new and effective gardening tips!

name: Mystery Case Files: A Crime in Reflection Collector's Edition
description: Just when you thought it was safe to take a vacation, the Crown calls you back into action! While burglary cases aren’t the Master Detective’s typical area of investigation, the police are stumped when a royal coronation scepter is stolen from one of the most secure museums in the world in the latest of a series of similar incidents, and they’re turning to you for help. The thieves have proven to be careless but crafty, somehow able to get in and out of the most secure locations in seconds and disappear into thin air! But what starts as a simple series of heists quickly spirals out of control when the criminals awaken something that will put them, the Master Detective, and even the world itself in grave danger! Can you unlock the bloody secrets the thieves discovered and save the day? There’s only one way to find out, Detective! Crack the case in this all-new Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure!

name: Undiscovered Technology of the Pharaohs
description: Undiscovered Technology of the Pharaohs is a map pack using a new yet unreleased Alkaline devkit. It features 3 egypt/techbase themed maps (start, main map, end).

name: Ghost Party
description: There is a killer on the loose! In Ghost Party, you play as a lonely ghost who wanders the halls of a haunted mansion to collect random items and help save its various inhabitants from an unknown murderer.

name: Crazy War
description: Arcade game by Eolith.

name: Bucketz
description:
A GAME ABOUT BALANCE… and pretty much everything else…

Join The Nine, the most unlikely gang of heroes in their desperate quest to restore balance to all things and uncover the mystery behind the Dark Bucket and the Minions!

name: Bucketz Ride
description:
The Bucketz are back! Get ready for a wild ride from the depths of the Pit all the way to the Heavens above where a Big Secret lies hidden.

In Bucketz Ride, you'll compete with friends and players around the world as you embark on a new epic adventure that will take you through treacherous oceans, bustling city scapes and to the farthest edges of the universe in search of the truth.

name: Photogenic
description: I wanted to become a doll inside a shop window.

name: Franky's Adventures
description: Join Franky on his Adventure! Wherever he goes, excitement and hi-jinks are sure to follow! Compete against other players in an infinite runner-style game and collect as many apples as possible!

name: Bananaventure
description: Bananaventure is a small 2d endless platform game with collectable gems and highscore.

name: Project U
description:
Codename "Project U" is a new kind of session-based cooperative shooter, in which players unite in massive battles against overwhelming legions of machines.
Ubisoft will have a PC-only Closed Test from February 1-6 in Europe and North America.

The game’s plot revolves around an invasion from the “machines”, who have one goal to ‘machineform’ all life. Players play as the ‘immune’, who are hero characters that seemingly can’t be machine-formed. A total of six characters currently exist, which are; Summer, Tau, Z-Rex, Lodestar, Swei, and Gallowglass.

name: Hannah Montana: Wireless Quest
description: Sin descripción

name: Project Madras
description:
Project Madras, is a semi-linear open-world game, being developed in Chennai, India, by a small team and led by developer leader Royston.

Explore and experience the vibe of namma chennai through "PROJECT MADRAS". The game which lets you roam around the shores of Marina ,streets of mount road , monuments of chennai covering all the highlights of this city ,with a mission to accomplish!.

The flavour of this open world game is rich in content and language, as it takes place in the capital city of the state, where the world's oldest language "TAMIL" is still surviving and embraced over centuries. Get involved with the natives of the city, where a rooted love and affection is served with some spicy madras delicacy.

name: Star Stable: The Spring Rider
description: Star stable: The Spring Rider takes place in the Jorvik Bay during spring and its main equestrian orientation is dressage. During the quests you are learning more of dressage and improve your horse riding. You also help different characters. You’re preparing yourself for prestige dressage competition in Rodilla Riding School and to be chosen as riding instructor for the spring horse camp.

name: Usemono Terminal
description: A puzzle escape room game to reunite lost items with their owners.

name: Chocolate Cage
description:
This was the last Valentine's Day of my high school life.

I, who had no luck with love, thought Valentine's Day would end uneventfully like it always does, but...

"Everything was going just as I planned."

name: Sporcle Party
description: From Sporcle, the world's largest trivia company, comes Sporcle Party. Challenge friends to topics from movies, geography, sports, literature, history and so much more. OR make your own pack. Perfect for office parties, classroom fun, baby showers and playing with friends - in person or virtually.

name: Frostrain
description: Be the last train conductor roaming the postapocalyptic frozen world! Expand, strengthen, and build synergies on your train. The promised land beyond the toxic zone awaits you and your passengers.

name: Stellar Wander DX
description: Stellar Wanderer DX is an old-school space combat sim set in a vast open-world universe. Follow the story or choose your favorite side missions as a mercenary fighter pilot. Explore the galaxy, upgrade your ship and weapons, trade resources and fight outlaws.

name: Batman the rooftop caper
description: This time, Batman is in for an interesting and dangerous adventure. While he was busy with important things, enemies managed to attack Gotham City, and now Batman must quickly eliminate them. Night does not last long, but during this time he has to manage to kill all the aliens. So Batman will be jumping on the rooftops, climbing to the top floors and kill the enemies. During the game, he will be given hints by the Blue Beetle - his loyal friend. Play Batman and help him overcome all obstacles. Collect boomerangs, because it is the main weapon used by our hero. Also collect badges to earn big points in the game. Kill the enemies as fast as possible and try to save your own life. Good luck!

name: Popeye
description:
Popeye is a Japan-exclusive Game Boy video game based on the comic strip of the same name licensed from King Features Syndicate.

A cancelled US version was found in the 2020 Nintendo data leak, intended to be published by INTV Corporation.

The scenario is a maze and the player controls Popeye who has a time limit to collect some hearts, find Olive Oyl and save Swee'Pea which only appears somewhere to be saved after the hearts were collected and Olive found.

name: Wolverine M.R.D. Escape
description: The X-men group is hold in a complex filled with traps, robots, lasers and cameras. Wolverine tries to escape and set free his friends and he mustn't be spotted. When moving through the corridors he uses his typical claws by cutting a lot of lines and robots. Do all the things to not turn on the alarm.

name: Enupishi
description: It was a forbidden love, something that was against the rules of the game. One night, they decided to escape. How far could they go?

name: Sora to Muku no 6-ki
description:
You are the commander and train 6 boys and girls as pilots of "Muku Airplane".
While building the deck, you use cards in your hand with various effects to teach the children the three statuses of "piloting," "shooting," and "support," as well as "special skills.

In this title, you select one of three countries to begin play.
Each country has its own play style and scenario, allowing for a variety of ways to play.

name: Sand Land: Collector Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Paw Patrol: Grand Prix - Complete Edition
description:
No track is too big, no racer too small!

Join your favorite PAW Patrol pups, and up-to 4 players at once, in their fastest paced adventure yet! Including every track from the original game and all the PUPtastic features from the DLC packs - RACE IN BARKINGBURG and PUP TREAT ARENA!

name: A Space for the Unbound: Special Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Chase It!
description:
Chase It is a homebrew Atari 2600 game developed by Alan W. Smith and released in 2010. The game was later included in the Atari Flashback series of plug-and-play consoles, starting with the Atari Flashback 5 in 2014, and most recently in the Atari Flashback X Deluxe in 2019.

In Chase It, two players (or one player and the computer) must move around the arena and touch a red square before their opponent. After this, the red square(s) move to a random location, and the first to touch it 99 times is the winner.

A selection of 20 game modes add variety to the gameplay; including adding a second red square, making the red squares move, adding obstacles to the arena, and changing the speed of the computer opponent.

name: Asterix & Obelix: Slap Them All! 2 - Gold Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Asterigos: Curse of the Stars - Collectors Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora - Deluxe Edition
description:
The Deluxe Edition includes the game as well as the Ultimate Pack with the Sarentu Heritage Cosmetic Pack and the Sarentu Hunter Equipment Pack!

Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora is a first-person, action-adventure game set in the Western Frontier. Reconnect with your lost heritage and discover what it truly means to be Na'vi as you join other clans to protect Pandora.

name: Class of Heroes
description: Sin descripción

name: Class of Heroes 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Class of Heroes 1 & 2 Complete Edition
description: Swords, Magic, School! The beloved JRPG dungeon crawler returns!

name: Way of the Hunter: Hunting Season One
description: Sin descripción

name: Bullet Hell Collection: Volume 1
description: Get ready to blast everything that stands in your way with this great compilation of 3 Shoot’Em Up! Bullet Hell Collection: Volume 1 is a bundle of 3 great Shoot'em ups developed by Panda Indie Studio: Void Gore, Project Starship and Z-Warp.

name: The C64 Collection 3
description:
13 great titles from the classic home computer system arrive on one physical Evercade cartridge! The C64 Collection 3 brings even more games from the 80s and 90s that live long in the memory of gamers all over the world.

The games included are Summer Games II, Boulder Dash, Heavy Metal Paradroid, Super Cycle, Jumpman Junior, Cyberdyne Warrior, Cybernoid II: The Revenge, Netherworld, Deliverance: Stormlord II, Anarchy, Exolon, Street Sports Soccer and Break Dance.

name: GT Manager
description: Take charge as the ultimate racing manager, leading your GT racing team to victory. Build your team, improve your car, and deploy winning race strategies across 5 official GT leagues, including the pinnacle of endurance racing: the hypercar category! Are you ready to dominate the world of GT racing?

name: Dying Light: My Apocalypse Collectors Edition
description:
Dying Light My Apocalypse Collectors Edition is an ultra-rare special edition version of the Dying Light

The Dying Light My Apocalypse Collectors Edition contains:

Custom built Dying Light Zombie Home by Tiger Log Cabins
Zombie avoidance parkour lessons with Ampisound, the team behind the internet smash Dying Light Parkour POV video
Be The Zombie match with devs where you win so you can brag to your friends how “leet” you are
Trip to Techland in Wroclaw, Poland, to meet the dev team and party with Steve the Zombie Consultant
Your face skinned onto your Night Hunter character model
Dying Light branded night vision goggles + adult diapers for the night portions of the game
x4 signed Steelbox editions of Dying Light
x2 Top of the line Razer Tiamat headphones
Human sized Volatile figurine to use as a deterrent on human raiders

name: WWE 2K24
description: Experience WWE 2K24’s bevy of spectacular modes, which includes a tribute to WrestleMania in 2K Showcase of the Immortals, MyRISE, MyFACTION, MyGM, and all-new match types like Guest Referee and Gauntlet.

name: WWE 2K24 Deluxe Edition
description: Grow your MyFACTION card collection with the WWE 2K24 Deluxe Edition, including the Deluxe Edition Bonus Pack, Nightmare Family Pack with MyFACTION content, and the Season Pass!

name: WWE 2K24 Forty Years of WrestleMania
description: WrestleMania is the biggest event in sports entertainment, where Superstars become WWE Legends. Experience a gripping retelling of WrestleMania’s greatest moments in 2K Showcase of the Immortals, where you can relive a collection of some of the most unforgettable, career-defining matches.

name: Ame's Happy Happy Dating Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Don't Die, Kangel!
description: Sin descripción

name: Break Out Kangel
description: Sin descripción

name: Battle Chess
description: Macintosh Port of Battle Chess

name: Vivat Sloboda
description: In minigame Vivat Sloboda, players will experience the period of the Velvet Revolution from the point of view of a taxi driver of the state taxi service, who accepts orders from staunch party officials, but also from students demanding change. Players will thus hear vastly different opinions.

name: Rearview Mirror
description: Rearview Mirror is a narrative videogame in which most of the events take place inside a car. From a first-person perspective, the player interacts with the passengers through the rearview mirror.

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Highway 35 Free Pack
description: Ballistik was born for pure speed, thanks to its aerodynamic line that cuts through the air creating a zero friction effect. Muscle Tone is driven by the desire for redemption and admiration, a force that pushes it to take on every race always at its best.

name: Imobilidade Urbana
description: Imobilidade Urbana is a horror side-scroller developed by the Homeless Workers' Movement Technology Center based on the issues related to the privatizations of São Paulo's transport and water systems, where control Glória who was on her way home from nursing work and came across a fault on the last train of the night. She gets stuck on the dark train and can't get off. The train announcer explains that the passengers must get out as quickly as possible, as their lives are at risk.

name: Dragon Ball Super: Card Game - Fusion World
description:
Welcome to DRAGON BALL SUPER CARD GAME FUSION WORLD, where you can battle using the warriors from DRAGON BALL!
Make super-powered attacks using Battle Card combos, and accelerate the battle by awakening your Leader Card!

name: AMQ: The (Actual) Game
description:
A bad AMQ game about guessing songs and being a booli
Includes over 300 songs, and a variety of (bad) gamemodes!

name: Tainá
description: In this game, adapted from the children's movie Tainá, the player controls the character that lends her name to the movie and the game, leading the little native girl through the Amazon forest, trying to escape enemies and dangers.

name: The Telwynium: Book Three - The Shadow of Spring
description:
The Summer King walks! The fellowship from Willows Dene has been split asunder, each a prisoner in grave, tomb or cell. Each faces their own peril, with only their wits to guide them against merciless brigands, the living dead, shadowfell, and the witches of Targoth.

The Telwynium: Book Three is an early 90s style point and click, with Sierra SCI0 style graphics, but with a fancy new-fangled point 'n click interface.

name: Demi Daggers
description: Take the cursed dagger, use its power to dispatch the horrors from this hellish place, score the best time! A fan game based on Devils Daggers for PICO-8.

name: Another World
description: A port of Another World game engine & assets to PICO-8.

name: Lost Lands: Sand Captivity - Collector's Edition
description:
Lift a mysterious curse, explore a fantasy world, and solve dozens of puzzles!

After the peace in the Lost Lands was restored, Susan decided to restore her own world. She had become a dedicated mother and a grandmother. All that reminded her of her previous adventures were the stories she told to her granddaughter under the guise of fairytales. But like mother, like son. Jim couldn’t walk by the artifact of the Lost Lands that was found on Earth. Accidentally, he unleashed an ancient curse. So now Susan has to return to the Lost Lands one more time to save her family.

Find a way to lift a mysterious curse with the help of the Lost Lands inhabitants, welcome familiar characters and meet the new ones to find solutions together with them!

name: Candy Puzzle
description: Candy Puzzle is a puzzle video game for Arcade, created and published by CD Express in 1995. The game is basically a Puzzle Bubble clone.

name: Escape It!
description:
Escape It is a homebrew Atari 2600 game developed by Alan W. Smith and released in 2011. The game was later included in the Atari Flashback series of plug-and-play consoles, starting with the Atari Flashback 5 in 2014, and most recently in the Atari Flashback X Deluxe in 2019.

In Escape It, two players must move their squares through a procedurally-generated maze, the layout of which completely regenerates around once per second. The first player to successfully navigate from the bottom-left corner of the screen to the exit at the top-right corner is the winner.

name: Mysterious Island
description:
The storm appeared suddenly, tossing Robin's ship against sharp cliffs.

Shipwrecked and lucky to be alive, he finds himself on the beach of a mysterious island inhabited by strange friends...and enemies. Now, to find a way home, he must explore, make allies and master the mysteries of his new surroundings. Mysterious Island offers a unique mix of adventure, role-playing and real-time strategy, with control of up to 5 characters. Danger lurks around every corner, as well as adventure. Are you ready to discover if the last of the dragons really lives somewhere in the islands?

name: Flashback 2: Collector's Edition
description:
The Collector’s Edition releases on Nintendo Switch, Xbox Series X and PlayStation 5, will include:

- Limited Edition
- The original Flashback video game in digital version
- An 8-inch (20cm) figurine of Conrad
- 3 lithographs
- A unique badge
- 2 stickers sheets

name: MP1: Mushroom Kingdom Party Board
description: Sin descripción

name: MP1: Orange Magma Mountain
description: Sin descripción

name: MP1: Snowy Fields
description: Sin descripción

name: Strip Off
description:
Strip Off is a homebrew Atari 2600 game developed by John Reder / Tactical Neuronics. It was given a limited cartridge release by Good Deal Games. Strip Off was later included on the Atari Flashback series of plug-and-play consoles, starting with the Atari Flashback 5 in 2014, and most recently on the Atari Flashback 9 Gold in 2018.

Strip Off is inspired by the vector arcade game Rip Off, but the gameplay itself is more comparable to other fixed shooters of the Atari 2600 era. The player controls a laser cannon that moves horizontally along the bottom of the screen. The goal is to earn points by defending a cluster of blocks located at the top of the screen from enemy spaceships that pick them up. As play continues, the spaceships move faster, until there are no blocks left and the game ends.

name: MP1: Kopitcha Castle
description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

name: MP1: Bowser's Magma Castle

name: Star Stable: The Autumn Rider
description:
Star Stable - The Autumn Riders!

- Care, train, compete, and master the art of horsemanship

Autumn.

Summer sheds its skin and the landscape begins to prepare for winter.
The trees shift their colors from summer greens to fiery red, warm yellow and sparkling orange.

In this time of change and opportunity a young girl arrives at the stables.

All her life she has loved horses. She has dreamed of being around them, caring them, nurturing them and feeling the freedom of riding horseback.
It is a beautiful dream, but that is all it has ever been.

Just a dream.

She is excited, but scared at the same time. In a world filled with strangers she has nothing to hold onto but her dream.
And she hopes that will be enough.

Thar girl is you.

Now live your dream!

name: Star Stable: The Winter Rider
description: The slowly falling snow drapes the landscape in a white veil, hides the bareness of the trees that long ago lost their leaves, and gives the land a sense of serenity. The world is quiet. Most singing birds have long since migrated to warmer places and animals have gone into hibernation, shielding themselves against the cold. But winter doesn't stop people and horses. Stables still need to be mucked out, horsed still need to be groomed and fed. Riders are getting ready for the Decker Horse Show -- the most prestigious jumping competition in the country. Only a few riders from the finest stables are selected to compete. Now all that is needed is a champion. Could that champion be YOU?!

name: Star Stable: The Summer Rider
description:
Warm days have finally arrived in Jorvik.

The sun sends it warming beams dancing across the ripe fields and blossoming meadows. The summer breeze sweeps in from the sea, soothing man and beast; hard working farmers, lazy dogs, sneaky cats, and horses. School's out and the seemingly endless summer vacation has just begun. There is no more homework, no more dusty history classes with Mrs. Corkwood, or mind-numbing science experiments with Mr. Flagstaff.

Just day after day of working for Herman who runs Jorvik Stables, riding and caring for the

horses. Life simply couldn't be better.

Then Coyote arrives.

He is Herman's brother, and he's decided to come home after two decades out West, where he has been a professional rodeo performer. Now he plans to build a Western-style riding park in Jorvik.

And he wants your help!

Soon there is fierce activity on Jorvik's northwestern peninsula, where farmland and swampland are rapidly being converted into paddocks and trails, and where you and the rest of the crew have a very limited time to learn barrel racing, pole bending, trail riding and show jumping. It is hard work and you have never had more fun in your life. But something is lurking beneath the surface. Strange rumors and intriguing gossip are spreading among the people on the farms and at Jorvik Ranch.

Is there more to Coyote's return than just homesickness?

And will you be able to uncover his secret?

name: Fisher-Price: Time To Play - Pet Shop
description: Time to Play Pet Shop gives kids the chance to feed and care for animals in an interactive setting. They can choose names, groom and bathe the animals, and play pet vet. There are nine activities in all. Along the way, they will learn about over 40 species of furry, feathered, and scaly animals while enjoying paw-stomping original songs.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Into the Pit
description:
Jump into the pit and immerse yourself in a new chapter in the Five Nights at Freddy’s universe. Oswald wishes his town, and his life, weren’t so boring. That all changes when he explores the ball pit in a rundown pizzeria and finds himself in the past. However, Oswald’s deepest desire will have an unexpected cost…

Survive five nights of terror in this chilling adventure game. Travel between time periods, gather clues, and outrun the threat relentlessly pursuing you. Move swiftly and stay hidden, and you may just survive. But be careful—it’s not just your own life that’s on the line. Oswald’s father and children from the past could all meet their end if you don’t save them.

description: Control a team of color based robots in the technologically advanced city of NeoTechropolis. As the robots harness the power of their unique colors to overcome challenges, they must unite to stop an imminent global threat.

name: Miss It!
description:
Miss It is a homebrew Atari 2600 game developed by Alan W. Smith and initially released online in 2009. The game went on to receive a limited cartridge release through Good Deal Games in 2011. Miss It was later included in the Atari Flashback series of plug-and-play consoles, starting with the Atari Flashback 5 in 2014, and most recently in the Atari Flashback X Deluxe in 2019.

In Miss It, the player must move a black square to avoid touching colorful squares that bounce around the screen, the number of which increases over time. The longer the player manages to avoid contact, the higher the score they achieve. The left difficulty switch can toggle the functionality of the score counter, either to go up 1 point every second, or to only increase when the the player is moving.

name: Photo Genic
description: In Photo Genic the player controls a young boy that got a job as a photographer. The main goal of the game is to improve the boy stats and photograph skills to make him win the heart of one of the girls of the town.

name: The 2030 Proto-Interfacer's Guide to House-Oriented Emotional Exploration
description: The game is an educational interactive computer software package adaptation of the New York Times #1 Bestselling book of the same name. Made by interfacers, for the means of enhancing the transitory period of the ones that may, or may not, come before. It lets you emulate the beautiful experience of being invited to a party, and then being at the party, in an unsafe environment.

name: Boulder Dash
description: The Super Cassette Vision port of Boulder Dash released in 1985.

name: Idol Project
description: In Idol Project, the player takes a role of a young man named Takashi, who works for a company called Mobius, an agency whose goal is to turn young Japanese girls into famous singers.

name: Idol Project 2
description: Unlike the first Idol Project, the story of the sequel is directly related to to the anime series Idol Project, starring the same characters, with the young and ambitious Mimu Emilton as the protagonist.

name: The Witcher 3: Enhanced Edition - Redux
description: The Witcher 3 Enhanced Edition is a total overhaul mod for The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt. It aims to enhance the game's experience by revamping combat, alchemy, economy, character progression and other mechanics. It introduces changes to make the game more challenging and realistic.

name: Ramen no Megami
description: A PC and mobile game where you manage a ramen restaurant.
